trans-unit.source: Indicates that the property grid should refresh when the associated property value changes.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshPropertiesAttribute> indicates the type of refresh mode to use when refreshing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshPropertiesAttribute> class is used for refreshing the design-time view.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshProperties"></xref> value indicating the nature of the refresh.
Indicates that all properties are queried again and refreshed if the property value is changed.
This field is read-only.
Specify this attribute on a property to query again and refresh all properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> when the property value changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> caches data.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshProperties.All> mode causes the Properties window to query each property again and refresh its view.
Indicates that no other properties are refreshed if the property value is changed.
This field is read-only.
Specify this attribute on a property to refresh only the associated property when the property value is changed.
Overrides the object's <xref href="System.Object.Equals*"></xref> method.
The object to test for equality.
`true` if the specified object is the same; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for this object.
The hash code for the object that the attribute belongs to.
Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
`true` if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the refresh properties for the member.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshProperties"></xref> that indicates the current refresh properties for the member.
Indicates that all properties are repainted if the property value is changed.
This field is read-only.
Specify this attribute on a property to repaint all properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> when the property value changes.
